short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help save our beloved country by forgetting about Zuma

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dear South Africans.

Help save our beloved country by helping each other to rebuild and restore South Africa to the glorious nation that it is.

You can help by forgetting about zuma and his family by sharing this app and helping us on the way to recovery.

This app removes all traces of the zuma name in any article that you read.

Be happy and be Zuma-free.

Please send any PayPal donations to: 

blackmambazaa@gmail.com
